S.FORM: 2 Ka tou dading-ding-en ki mamang ni-dming-ding-kamou, dingding-auh-kamou-rå: ka tou rarpung-en ki mamang ka nirmarpung-kamou, rarpung-auh-kamou-rå.
3 Ka kaumang ka k'ita-enhou ta houka ka tou matta ki tæ'iapara oho, râ ælogh [ka pærænæh] ka tou matta oho assi ymhou pou-liliht-in?
4 Nda mattai-mam-ah-kow ki mang ki tæi-appara oho, hamiau-mau ta houka tou matta oho, ka kyttei, akou-ælogh tou mattaoho?
5 [Ymhou ka] pa-nni-nni-en ki rÿh ki sou, ha-aurou-auta alogh tou matta-oho, dou-miaka mara-rauah-kow ki 'ææu-matta-au'mhou ta houka tou matta ki tæi-apara-oho.

6 Ynna pia tou affou-affou-an ki ni-pa-sa-nni tou tatamd-en ki Alid, ynna maring ta vahto-oumi ka tæi-qua tou koudo smaki-qua tou kavou-youlou-an, alei ka assi hmitgid-ah ki anna ki na kourkour nein, ka dou ni-mǣeu-vering kmavys-ah ymoumi-æn-ra.
7 Tmoumimi-â, ka 'pæ-eih-kamou: kmi-ym-â ka ma-ki-valeiah-kamou: tmubtib-â ka 'ǣæulbeih-kamou.
